thought: The website is accessible. Now I need to extract the text and hyperlinks to analyze the content.
observation: Garcia Aviation Co.  Search Cart 0 Menu Home Catalog Thanks for visiting Garcia Aviation Co.  See our featured collections below or browse our catalogs for hundreds of unique and one of a kind items. Shop For More categories › GLOVES BOMBERS B-17 B-24 B-29 Example Product Title $19 99 $19.99 Save $10 Sold Out Share Share on Facebook Tweet Tweet on Twitter Pin it Pin on Pinterest Featured collection More goggles & accessories › AN-6530 FLYING GOGGLE REPLACEMENT FACE CUSHION-READY TO INSTALL Regular price $95 00 $95.00 AN-6530/B-7 NAVY TAN REPLACEMENT GOGGLE STRAP $18 95 $18.95 AVIATOR SUNGLASSES WWII TYPE $12 BRITISH MK VIII STYLE FLYING GOGGLES $24 $24.95 More miscellaneous & vintage aviation › AN-6530 FLYING GOGGLES- CHAS. FISCHER NAVAL AVIATOR OYSTER COLORED LEATHER FLYING HELMET CHIN CUP $8 U.S. ROUTE 66 BRONZE HIGHWAY PILOT WINGS HARD FIRED ENAMEL 50 $149.50 More helmets & headgear › B-7/AN-6530 GOGGLE TWO PIECE FACE CUSHIONS-READY TO INSTALL AVIATRIX CLOTH CRÈME COLORED FLYING HELMET Previous Next Garcia Aviation Company has been in business for 30 years. We are a full time business. We have supplied the motion picture industry with authentic props and consultation. Some of the productions we have supplied include the movies, The Memphis Belle, HBO Tuskegee Airman, Saving Private Ryan, The Aviator, Amelia Earhart, Band of Brothers, Red Tails, 2019 Midway and several foreign films. We have a superb offering of WWII aircraft flight manuals reprinted from originals in the Garcia Aviation Collection. We have also reproduced many authentic aviation items to include vintage flying helmets, flying scarves, flying gloves, insignia and many other items. We have been a top rated Seller on E-Bay for over 24 years with over 50,000 Positive Feed backs. From the beginning we have always offered a full no hassle money back guarantee. Full satisfaction guarantee. We have shipped thousands of parcels to all corners of the earth. We offer many unique and hard to find aviation items. James Garcia, the owner, travels on a regular basis seeking new aviation treasure from long forgotten warehouses and hard to locate sources. We welcome the opportunity to serve your aviation needs. WE SHIP WORLDWIDE. Your business is truly appreciated. Thanks. James Garcia Get in touch 9 Autumnwood Ct. Edgewood, NM 87015 jgaviation@aol.com Newsletter E-mail Sign Up © 2024 Powered by Shopify paypal Close Cart

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain has been registered for a long time and the business claims to have been in operation for 30 years. The information also seems to be legitimate and does not fit the characteristics of a scam website. {

observation.reason: The website appears to be a legitimate business selling aviation-related items. The WHOIS information supports the claim that the business has been established for a long time, which is inconsistent with the characteristics of a scam website. Additionally, the website provides clear contact information, including an email and phone number, further supporting its legitimacy.
